Is the space of closed curves complete?

2022, Jul 04    

In the blog “image segmentation via manifold optimization” we consider the space of all closed curves to be a Riemannian manifold. To minimize function on manifold via optimization mehtod, the geodescic completeness of manifold is the primary requirement. In this report we discuss the completeness properties of this Riemannian manifold.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/19x6048naO7b3WkZdcUeX9mXIZqM3TtoW/view?usp=share_link
